mapper.select: SELECT c.*, e.name as employee_name, e.emp_no FROM contract c LEFT JOIN employee e ON c.employee_id = e.id WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.*, e.name as employee_name, e.emp_no FROM contract c LEFT JOIN employee e ON c.employee_id = e.id WHERE c.employee_id = #{employeeId} AND c.status = 'active' ORDER BY c.create_time DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract (employee_id, contract_no, type, start_date, end_date, status, create_time) VALUES (#{employeeId}, #{contractNo}, #{type}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status}, NOW())
